snippet: In a lecture in Cartagena, the brother of Gabriel García Márquez said that the author “is doing well physically, but he has been suffering from dementia for a long time.”
abstract: In a lecture in Cartagena, the brother of Gabriel García Márquez said that the author “is doing well physically, but he has been suffering from dementia for a long time.”

headline.main: Brother Says García Márquez Has Dementia
headline.print_headline: García Márquez Said to Have Dementia
